games.saloon

Class Bottle

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.saloon.GameObject
        • games.saloon.Bottle

  • public class Bottle
extends GameObject
    A bottle thrown by a bartender at a Tile.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String direction
      The Direction this Bottle is flying and will move to between turns, can be 'North', 'East', 'South', or 'West'.
      java.lang.String drunkDirection
      The direction any Cowboys hit by this will move, can be 'North', 'East', 'South', or 'West'.
      boolean isDestroyed
      True if this Bottle has impacted and has been destroyed (removed from the Game).
      Tile tile
      The Tile this bottle is currently flying over.

      • Fields inherited from class games.saloon.GameObject

        gameObjectName, logs

      • Fields inherited from class joueur.BaseGameObject

        id

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bottle()
      Creates a new instance of a Bottle.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class games.saloon.GameObject

        log

      • Methods inherited from class joueur.BaseGameObject

        runOnServer

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • direction

        public java.lang.String direction
        The Direction this Bottle is flying and will move to between turns, can be 'North', 'East', 'South', or 'West'.

      • drunkDirection

        public java.lang.String drunkDirection
        The direction any Cowboys hit by this will move, can be 'North', 'East', 'South', or 'West'.

      • isDestroyed

        public boolean isDestroyed
        True if this Bottle has impacted and has been destroyed (removed from the Game). False if still in the game flying through the saloon.

      • tile

        public Tile tile
        The Tile this bottle is currently flying over.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bottle

        public Bottle()
        Creates a new instance of a Bottle. Used during game initialization, do not call directly.
